instructions: Select the songs you want to include in your CD. You can choose up to 15 songs or up to 70 minutes total.
Rearrange your playlist by dragging the songs into your preferred order.
Give your CD a unique name.
Review your playlist. You can remove songs or add more as long as you stay within the limit.
Submit your CD burn request. Rob Meglio will personally curate your playlist, write a personalized note, and design the CD cover with a sharpie.
Your CD will be mailed to your house within 2-4 weeks. You will be contacted for payment and shipping details shortly.
